Uses of Interface
app.logics.board.IBoard

  • Packages that use IBoard 
    Package Description
    app.gui.board
    Package provides classes that provide graphical representation of a board.
    app.gui.board.grid
    Package provides classes that provide graphical representation for board segments, different grids
    app.logics.board
    Package provides base classes for board presentation
    app.main
    Package provides classes for application entry point
